name: osMDS - A Tiny Asteroids Clone
description:
osMDS is a small multi-directional arcade shooter. Don't hit the edge of the circle. Try to get a high score.

  • WASD to move the ship
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left Mouse Button to shoot
  • You have 5 lives. You regenerate 1 life for every 20 asteroids destroyed.
  • Your score increases based on how many asteroids you destroy and how long you have been alive. Live longer, destroy more asteroids, get a higher score.

Source is available on Github. MIT License.
